EmailTemplate.name: J-One Availability.J-ONE Contacts
EmailTemplate.subject: J-ONE Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
J-ONE Contact Information Updated 5/2/13 Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer},
TriTech is pleased to announce Version 6.1.12 of the Perform software now has J-ONE functionality available to all New Hampshire departments.
If you would like to participate in the J-ONE Program, contact: Keith Lohmann, J-ONE Program Manager Phone: (603) 223-3889 Email: keith.lohmann@dos.nh.gov <mailto:keith.lohmann@dos.nh.gov>.
If you need information on obtaining printers for eCitation, contact: New Hampshire Highway Safety Agency Phone: (603) 271-2131 Email: hwysafety@nhhsa.state.nh.us <mailto:hwysafety@nhhsa.state.nh.us>
To download the latest version of the Perform software please login to your Customer Service Center (portal) at www.tritech.com. For software updates questions, you may contact: TriTech Technical Support Phone: (800) 987-0911, select Option #4 Email: performsupport@tritech.com <mailto:performsupport@tritech.com>
We apologize for any inconvenience caused by our previous communications.
David Bourbonniere Project Management & Training Supervisor TriTech Software Systems
